Hello. I'm Adam Zverka.

I'm a software developer and student from Nitra interested in backend development and IoT. Currently I'm pursuing a Master's degree in Applied Informatics at Constantine the Philosopher University in Nitra and I'm working part-time as Java Developer at Muehlbauer Automation s.r.o.

Skills

Projects

Event Calendar

Team project focused on developing event based calendar for university using Vue.js, Laravel and Docker for deployment. Team consisted of 4 developers, I was the teamleader, frontend developer and I was also in charge of Azure CI/CD.

Vue.js Laravel Docker Azure DevOps

Flaskord

Simple Slack/Discord clone based on cs50w "Flack" project using Flask and Vue.js.

Python Flask Vue.js Bulma

PortalBrigad

CRUD application for managing part-time jobs built using CodeIgniter and AdminLTE.

PHP CodeIgniter

Smart home

The goal of this team project was to create a model of smart home controllable with Android application. My task was to develop a Flask application which would take commands from Android app and then control microcontroller connected to IBM Cloud.

Python Flask Arduino Android IBM Cloud

FaceRecognitionApp

Simple Android face recognition application using CameraKit API and IBM Watson Visual Recognition Service. Application draws rectangle around detected face and displays gender and expected age.

Java Android IBM Watson Visual Recognition
